name: SLAYER (itch) (ErizoT)
description:
This was a game I made for my second assignment in Game Design 1 here at RMIT!

You play as a super soldier, tasked to kill an endless mob of munchers, cannons, and laser towers until your dying breath! Use your auto-locking shotgun to kill nearby enemies, and utilise the charge shot to create a larger blast! All the while bobbing and weaving the many projectiles and enemies that come your way!

CONTROLS!

Move - Arrow Keys

Basic Shot - Press Space

Charge Shot - Hold Space
